title: Dragon no Omawari-san
original_name: ドラゴンのおまわりさん
sinopse:
A world where humans and fantasies coexist... A human police officer, Hagi Ogihara, patrols the city today with his fellow dragon police officer, Hinagiku! The odd couple of a careless good-for-nothing human and a scary looking but earnest and gentle dragon are on the case!

(Source: LINE Digital Frontier, translated)
